record.id: field.name="mtbf.adjusted" and file.name="slamonthly" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: mtbf.adjusted
record.file.name: slamonthly

brief.brief: The average time (in hours) that the configuration item (CI) has been available for the Month indicated.
Service Manager populates this field automatically

detail.detail: Service Manager calculates the mean time between failures by dividing the total number of outages into the total number of hours that the CI has been available, excluding time outside of the schedule defined for the Service Target.
This time measurement can also indicate the length of time a user may reasonably expect the CI to work before an outage occurs.
